item.title: ***Delete*** **FIXED**
item.dc:creator: @alexsandryan alexsandryan
item.description:
@alexsandryan wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:545902”][quote author=alexsandryan link=topic=664788.msg4443966#msg4443966 date=1407887614]

I’d look in the “Player” class and look for where they declare a new Player object with the _playerId parameter and it should have the defaults in there.

playerAppearance[0] = 0; // gender playerAppearance[1] = 0; // head playerAppearance[2] = 24;// Torso playerAppearance[3] = 28; // arms playerAppearance[4] = 35; // hands playerAppearance[5] = 39; // legs playerAppearance[6] = 44; // feet playerAppearance[7] = 14; // beard playerAppearance[8] = 7; // hair colour playerAppearance[9] = 8; // torso colour playerAppearance[10] = 9; // legs colour playerAppearance[11] = 5; // feet colour playerAppearance[12] = 0; // skin colour

Thanks man appreciate it, One more question bro how can i fix the invisible waist? Is there a download link for 667 Character Models or 711 Character Models?
[/quote]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/454769-data-releases-474-498-508-525-602-634-667-a.html
Should be in there.[/quote]

Man You are just a wonderful guy!!! Appreciate it bro!

Read full topic

item.title: ***Delete*** **FIXED**

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“alexsandryan, post:1, topic:545903”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=664788.msg4443956#msg4443956 date=1407885793]
I’d look in the “Player” class and look for where they declare a new Player object with the _playerId parameter and it should have the defaults in there.

playerAppearance[0] = 0; // gender playerAppearance[1] = 0; // head playerAppearance[2] = 24;// Torso playerAppearance[3] = 28; // arms playerAppearance[4] = 35; // hands playerAppearance[5] = 39; // legs playerAppearance[6] = 44; // feet playerAppearance[7] = 14; // beard playerAppearance[8] = 7; // hair colour playerAppearance[9] = 8; // torso colour playerAppearance[10] = 9; // legs colour playerAppearance[11] = 5; // feet colour playerAppearance[12] = 0; // skin colour
[/quote]

Thanks man appreciate it, One more question bro how can i fix the invisible waist? Is there a download link for 667 Character Models or 711 Character Models?[/quote]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/454769-data-releases-474-498-508-525-602-634-667-a.html
Should be in there.
